actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a project for flood protection for Lake Wichita, Holliday Creek, Texas.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a flood protection project for Lake Wichita, Holliday Creek, Texas.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a project for flood protection for Lake Wichita, Holliday Creek, Texas.
